languages.text: "С подобным положением дел сложно смириться. Но я постараюсь".

traits.locale_text: "С подобным положением дел сложно смириться. Но я постараюсь".

languages.text: "It is difficult to accept this state of affairs. But I shall endeavour to do so."
languages.original_text: "С подобным положением дел сложно смириться. Но я постараюсь".

traits.locale_text: "It is difficult to accept this state of affairs. But I shall endeavour to do so."
"It is difficult to accept this state of affairs. But I shall endeavour to do so."
"It is difficult to accept this state of affairs. But I shall endeavour to do so."
"It is difficult to accept this state of affairs. But I shall endeavour to do so."

languages.text: “我很难一下子接受目前的状况，但我会努力适应的。”
languages.original_text: "It is difficult to accept this state of affairs. But I shall endeavour to do so."

traits.locale_text: “我很难一下子接受目前的状况，但我会努力适应的。”

languages.text: 「この状況は受け入れがたいが、できる限りの努力はしよう」
languages.original_text: "It is difficult to accept this state of affairs. But I shall endeavour to do so."

traits.locale_text: 「この状況は受け入れがたいが、できる限りの努力はしよう」

languages.text: "Es ist schwer, diese Situation zu akzeptieren. Aber ich werde mich darum bemühen."
languages.original_text: "It is difficult to accept this state of affairs. But I shall endeavour to do so."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist schwer, diese Situation zu akzeptieren. Aber ich werde mich darum bemühen."

languages.text: « Une telle situation me pèse. Mais je m'efforcerai de faire de mon mieux. »
languages.original_text: "It is difficult to accept this state of affairs. But I shall endeavour to do so."

traits.locale_text: « Une telle situation me pèse. Mais je m'efforcerai de faire de mon mieux. »

languages.text: «Es difícil aceptar esta situación, pero me esforzaré por conseguirlo».
languages.original_text: "It is difficult to accept this state of affairs. But I shall endeavour to do so."

traits.locale_text: «Es difícil aceptar esta situación, pero me esforzaré por conseguirlo».

languages.text: "Vaziyet böyleyken kabul etmek zor olacak ama peki, gayret edeceğim."
languages.original_text: "It is difficult to accept this state of affairs. But I shall endeavour to do so."

traits.locale_text: "Vaziyet böyleyken kabul etmek zor olacak ama peki, gayret edeceğim."
